comments.author: Teodoro Alcántara Aquino
comments.content: Here the user specifies the document type (if it is a sell contract or a rent contract or other kind of document) This information is needed to accuarately fill the DocumentCreationScreen (which is where the document data is captured)

comments.author: Teodoro Alcántara Aquino
comments.content: The items under Personal info. Label and Item Description label are grouped in a groupbox (i don't know how to represet that here)

comments.author: Teodoro Alcántara Aquino
comments.content: The items under Item Description label should be a set of labels and input fields that go to variate depending of the Document Type
